good_points: The laptop was in very good condition and delivered on time. The service is extremely satisfying. The company is recommended for purchases. Everything is great about them.
bad_points: Some software glitches were present in the laptop, and troubleshooting instructions were insufficient. A smartphone was delivered with a damaged screen. Some deliveries take too long.
improvement_points: Provide more detailed manuals for troubleshooting software issues. Improve packaging to prevent product damage. Reduce shipping delays to improve delivery times.
